overview: Habil & Qabil (Cain & Abel) is a book based upon the Animated Film adaptation of a story from the Holy Quran. It is the story of the sons of Prophet Adam (pbuh) and how one came to kill the other being spurred by the evil whisperings of Shaitan. The book is printed throughout on full-colour high quality glossy art paper.
title: Habil & Qabil
